item.title: We Can't Confirm Or Deny
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: Matt is on vacation, Twitch.tv adopts a new Youtube-like audio recognition and take-down system, Crytek speaks publicly about its financial situation, Valve soft-launches Source Engine 2, preorders are down and digital sales are up; we discuss Twitch acquisition rumors, Jedi Academy mods, hudless games, and much more!
